title: Tooling Operations Finance Analyst (12 month contract)
summary: At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish. The people here at Apple don’t just create products — they create the kind of wonder that’s revolutionised entire industries. It’s the diversity of those people and their ideas that inspires innovation that runs through everything we do, from amazing technology to industry-leading environmental efforts. Join Apple and help us enrich lives and leave the world in a better place than we found it!
description:
Approve Tooling Spend across Apples Global Tooling landscape
Maintain Tooling budgets to prevent overspend
Review requests to sell or dispose Apple’s manufacturing assets
Provision of KPIs & Management metrics to help the business understand key cost drivers. 
Lead Quarterly Business Reviews with Senior Operations and Finance personnel.
Partner cross-regionally with peers and senior finance managers in APAC and WW to develop and implement global initiatives.
Maintenance of Tooling SOX controls
Provide ad-hoc support to the EMEIA Operations Finance management team
preferred_qualifications:
excellent analytical and problem solving skills
strong technical skills with an ability to deal with large volumes of data, develop reporting efficiencies & summarise key aspects
strong communication and interpersonal skills with the ability to connect with people
should be able to deliver in a fast-paced work environment & to strive for excellence
positive energy & attitude with a desire to drive constant improvement & change
ability to cut through ambiguity, to listen, challenge & innovate
possess candour and resilience that allows them to succeed in a challenging environment
The successful candidate must be analytical, self-motivated, curious & flexible, a self-starter who works well both individually and in teams.
